20101214063920.333|20101214063922.000|CCO|GRATEFUL TO THEM.
20101214063922.000|20101214063923.667|CCO|GIVE THEM A BIG ROUND OF
20101214063923.667|20101214063925.333|CCO|APPLAUSE.
20101214063925.333|20101214063927.000|CCO|IT IS WORTH NOTING THAT THIS
20101214063927.000|20101214063928.667|CCO|BILL PASSED WITH BIPARTISAN
20101214063928.667|20101214063930.333|CCO|SUPPORT IN BOTH HOUSES OF
20101214063930.333|20101214063932.000|CCO|CONGRESS.
20101214063932.000|20101214063934.500|CCO|THAT HAS HAPPENED AS OFTEN AS WE
20101214063934.500|20101214063937.000|CCO|WOULD LIKE OVER THE LAST COUPLE
20101214063937.000|20101214063939.500|CCO|OF YEARS, BUT I THINK IT SAYS
20101214063939.500|20101214063942.000|CCO|SOMETHING ABOUT OUR POLITICS.
20101214063942.000|20101214063944.000|CCO|IT REMINDS US THAT NO MATTER
20101214063944.000|20101214063946.000|CCO|WHAT PEOPLE MAY HEAR ABOUT HOW
20101214063946.000|20101214063948.000|CCO|DIVIDED THINGS ARE IN
20101214063948.000|20101214063950.000|CCO|WASHINGTON, WE CAN STILL COME
20101214063950.000|20101214063952.000|CCO|TOGETHER AND AGREE ON ISSUES
20101214063952.000|20101214063953.667|CCO|THAT MATTER FOR OUR CHILDREN'S
20101214063953.667|20101214063955.333|CCO|FUTURE AND FOR OUR FUTURE AS A
20101214063955.333|20101214063957.000|CCO|NATION.
20101214063957.000|20101214063958.667|CCO|AND THAT IS REALLY WHAT TODAY IS
20101214063958.667|20101214064000.333|CCO|ALL ABOUT.
20101214064000.333|20101214064002.000|CCO|AT A VERY BASIC LEVEL, THIS ACT
20101214064002.000|20101214064003.667|CCO|IS ABOUT DOING WHAT IS RIGHT FOR
20101214064003.667|20101214064005.333|CCO|OUR CHILDREN.
20101214064005.333|20101214064007.000|CCO|RIGHT NOW ALL ACROSS THIS
20101214064007.000|20101214064008.667|CCO|COUNTRY, TOO MANY KIDS DO NOT
20101214064008.667|20101214064010.333|CCO|HAVE ACCESS TO SCHOOL MEALS.
20101214064010.333|20101214064012.000|CCO|OFTEN THE FOOD THAT IS BEING
20101214064012.000|20101214064013.667|CCO|OFFERED IS NOT AS HEALTHY OR AS
20101214064013.667|20101214064015.333|CCO|NUTRITIOUS AS IT SHOULD BE.
20101214064015.333|20101214064017.000|CCO|THAT IS PART OF THE REASON WHY
20101214064017.000|20101214064018.667|CCO|ONE IN THREE CHILDREN IN AMERICA
20101214064018.667|20101214064020.333|CCO|TODAY ARE EITHER OVERWEIGHT OR
20101214064020.333|20101214064022.000|CCO|OBESE.
20101214064022.000|20101214064023.667|CCO|AND WE'RE SEEING THIS PROBLEM IN
20101214064023.667|20101214064025.333|CCO|EVERY PART OF THE COUNTRY IN
20101214064025.333|20101214064027.000|CCO|KIDS FROM ALL DIFFERENT
20101214064027.000|20101214064028.667|CCO|BACKGROUNDS AND ALL WALKS OF
20101214064028.667|20101214064030.333|CCO|LIFE.
20101214064030.333|20101214064032.000|CCO|AS A RESULT, AND DOCTORS ARE NOW
20101214064032.000|20101214064034.000|CCO|STARTING TO SEE CONDITIONS LIKE
20101214064034.000|20101214064036.000|CCO|HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE AND HIGH
20101214064036.000|20101214064038.000|CCO|CHOLESTEROL, AND TIGHT II
20101214064038.000|20101214064040.000|CCO|DIABETES IN CHILDREN.
20101214064040.000|20101214064042.000|CCO|THESE ARE THINGS THAT THEY ONLY
20101214064042.000|20101214064043.667|CCO|USED TO SEE IN ADULTS.
20101214064043.667|20101214064045.333|CCO|THIS BILL IS ABOUT REVERSING
20101214064045.333|20101214064047.000|CCO|THAT TREND AND GIVING OUR KIDS
20101214064047.000|20101214064048.667|CCO|THE HEALTHY FUTURES THAT THEY
20101214064048.667|20101214064050.333|CCO|DESERVE.
20101214064050.333|20101214064052.000|CCO|THIS BILL IS ALSO ABOUT DOING
20101214064052.000|20101214064054.000|CCO|WHAT IS RIGHT FOR OUR COUNTRY,
20101214064054.000|20101214064056.000|CCO|BECAUSE WE FEEL THE STRAINS THAT
20101214064056.000|20101214064058.000|CCO|TREE SEEN -- THAT TREATING
20101214064058.000|20101214064100.000|CCO|OBESITY-RELATED HEALTH
20101214064100.000|20101214064102.000|CCO|CONDITIONS PUTS ON OUR ECONOMY.
20101214064102.000|20101214064103.667|CCO|WE HAVE SEEN THE CONNECTION
20101214064103.667|20101214064105.333|CCO|BETWEEN WHAT OUR KIDS EAT AND
20101214064105.333|20101214064107.000|CCO|HOW WELL THEY PERFORM IN SCHOOL.
20101214064107.000|20101214064108.667|CCO|AND WE KNOW THAT THE COUNTRIES
20101214064108.667|20101214064110.333|CCO|THAT SUCCEED IN THE 21ST CENTURY
20101214064110.333|20101214064112.000|CCO|WILL BE THE ONES THAT HAVE THE
20101214064112.000|20101214064113.429|CCO|BEST PREPARED, BEST EDUCATED
20101214064113.429|20101214064114.857|CCO|WORKFORCE AROUND.
20101214064114.857|20101214064116.286|CCO|WE NEED TO MAKE SURE THAT OUR
20101214064116.286|20101214064117.714|CCO|KIDS HAVE THE ENERGY AND THE
20101214064117.714|20101214064119.143|CCO|CAPACITY TO GO TOE TO TOE WITH
20101214064119.143|20101214064120.571|CCO|ANY OF THEIR PEERS ANYWHERE IN
20101214064120.571|20101214064122.000|CCO|THE WORLD.
20101214064122.000|20101214064123.667|CCO|WE NEED TO MAKE SURE THAT THEY
20101214064123.667|20101214064125.333|CCO|ARE ALL REACHING THEIR
20101214064125.333|20101214064127.000|CCO|POTENTIAL.
20101214064127.000|20101214064128.667|CCO|THAT IS PRECISELY SLEEP WHAT
20101214064128.667|20101214064130.333|CCO|THIS BILL -- THAT IS PRECISELY
20101214064130.333|20101214064132.000|CCO|WHAT THIS BILL WILL ACCOMPLISH.
20101214064132.000|20101214064133.667|CCO|THIS LEGISLATION WILL HELP
20101214064133.667|20101214064135.333|CCO|115,000 CHILDREN GAIN ACCESS TO
20101214064135.333|20101214064137.000|CCO|SCHOOL MEAL PROGRAMS.
20101214064137.000|20101214064138.667|CCO|WHEREVER WE CAN, WE'RE DOING
20101214064138.667|20101214064140.333|CCO|AWAY WITH BUREAUCRACY AND RED
20101214064140.333|20101214064142.000|CCO|TAPE SO THAT FAMILIES DO NOT
20101214064142.000|20101214064143.667|CCO|HAVE TO FILL OUT MOUNTAINS OF
20101214064143.667|20101214064145.333|CCO|PAPERWORK TO GET KIDS THE
20101214064145.333|20101214064147.000|CCO|NUTRITION THEY NEED.
20101214064147.000|20101214064148.667|CCO|WE ARE IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF
20101214064148.667|20101214064150.333|CCO|THOSE MEALS BY REIMBURSING
20101214064150.333|20101214064152.000|CCO|SCHOOLS AN ADDITIONAL 6 CENTS
20101214064152.000|20101214064153.667|CCO|PER LUNCH TO HELP THEM PROVIDE
20101214064153.667|20101214064155.333|CCO|WITH HEALTHIER OPTIONS -- THE
20101214064155.333|20101214064157.000|CCO|FIRST REAL INCREASE IN OVER 30
20101214064157.000|20101214064158.667|CCO|YEARS.
20101214064158.667|20101214064200.333|CCO|WHEN OUR KIDS WALK INTO THE
20101214064200.333|20101214064202.000|CCO|LUNCHROOM, WE WANT TO BE SURE
20101214064202.000|20101214064204.000|CCO|THAT THEY'RE GETTING BALANCED,
20101214064204.000|20101214064206.000|CCO|NUTRITIOUS MEALS THAT THEY NEED
20101214064206.000|20101214064208.000|CCO|TO SUCCEED IN THE CLASSROOM.
20101214064208.000|20101214064210.000|CCO|WE ARE EMPOWERING PARENTS BY
20101214064210.000|20101214064212.000|CCO|MAKING A COMMISSION MORE
20101214064212.000|20101214064214.000|CCO|AVAILABLE OF RIGID ABOUT THE
20101214064214.000|20101214064216.000|CCO|QUALITY OF SCHOOL MEALS, HELPING
20101214064216.000|20101214064218.000|CCO|FAMILIES UNDERSTAND WHAT THEIR
20101214064218.000|20101214064220.000|CCO|KIDS ARE EATING DURING THE DAY.
20101214064220.000|20101214064222.000|CCO|-- WE ARE EMPOWERING PARENTS BY
20101214064222.000|20101214064224.000|CCO|MAKING INFORMATION MORE
20101214064224.000|20101214064226.000|CCO|AVAILABLE ABOUT THE QUALITY OF
20101214064226.000|20101214064228.000|CCO|SCHOOL MEALS, HELPING FAMILIES
20101214064228.000|20101214064230.000|CCO|UNDERSTAND WHAT THEIR KIDS ARE
20101214064230.000|20101214064232.000|CCO|EATING DURING THE DAY.
20101214064232.000|20101214064233.429|CCO|TO SUPPORT OUR SCHOOLS EFFORTS
20101214064233.429|20101214064234.857|CCO|TO SERVE FRESH FRUITS AND
20101214064234.857|20101214064236.286|CCO|VEGETABLES, WE CONNECTING THEM
20101214064236.286|20101214064237.714|CCO|WITH LOCAL FARMERS.
20101214064237.714|20101214064239.143|CCO|WE'RE IMPROVING FOOD SAFETY IN
20101214064239.143|20101214064240.571|CCO|SCHOOL AND BOOSTING THE QUALITY
20101214064240.571|20101214064242.000|CCO|OF COMMODITIES LIKE CHEESE.
20101214064242.000|20101214064244.000|CCO|IT IS ALSO IMPORTANT TO NOTE THE
20101214064244.000|20101214064246.000|CCO|WHILE THIS BILL WAS FULLY PAID
20101214064246.000|20101214064248.000|CCO|FOR, IT WILL NOT ADD A DIME TO
20101214064248.000|20101214064250.000|CCO|THE DEFICIT, SOME OF THE FUNDING
20101214064250.000|20101214064252.000|CCO|COMING FROM ROLLING BACK A
20101214064252.000|20101214064253.667|CCO|TEMPORARY INCREASE IN FOOD STAMP
20101214064253.667|20101214064255.333|CCO|BENEFITS, OR SNAP AS IT IS NOW
20101214064255.333|20101214064257.000|CCO|CALLED, STARTING IN THE FALL OF
20101214064257.000|20101214064258.667|CCO|2013.
20101214064258.667|20101214064300.333|CCO|I KNOW A NUMBER OF MEMBERS OF
20101214064300.333|20101214064302.000|CCO|CONGRESS HAVE EXPRESSED CONCERNS
20101214064302.000|20101214064303.429|CCO|ABOUT THIS OFFSET, AND I AM
20101214064303.429|20101214064304.857|CCO|COMMITTED TO WORKING WITH HIM TO
20101214064304.857|20101214064306.286|CCO|RESTORING THESE FUNDS IN THE
20101214064306.286|20101214064307.714|CCO|FUTURE.
20101214064307.714|20101214064309.143|CCO|WE KNOW THAT EVERY DAY ACROSS
20101214064309.143|20101214064310.571|CCO|THIS COUNTRY, PARENTS ARE
20101214064310.571|20101214064312.000|CCO|WORKING AS HARD AS THEY CAN TO
20101214064312.000|20101214064313.250|CCO|DO HEALTHY CHOICES FOR THEIR
20101214064313.250|20101214064314.500|CCO|KIDS.
20101214064314.500|20101214064315.750|CCO|SCHOOLS ARE DOING EVERYTHING
20101214064315.750|20101214064317.000|CCO|POSSIBLE TO PROVIDE THE
20101214064317.000|20101214064318.250|CCO|NUTRITIOUS FOOD THEY NEED TO
20101214064318.250|20101214064319.500|CCO|THRIVE.
20101214064319.500|20101214064320.750|CCO|COMMUNITIES ARE COMING TOGETHER
20101214064320.750|20101214064322.000|CCO|TO HELP OUR YOUNG PEOPLE LEAD
20101214064322.000|20101214064323.667|CCO|HEALTHIER LIVES RIGHT FROM THE
20101214064323.667|20101214064325.333|CCO|BEGINNING.
20101214064325.333|20101214064327.000|CCO|IT'S TIME THAT WE MADE THAT WORK
20101214064327.000|20101214064328.667|CCO|EASIER.
20101214064328.667|20101214064330.333|CCO|THESE FOLKS ARE FULFILLING THEIR
20101214064330.333|20101214064332.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITIES TO OUR KIDS.
20101214064332.000|20101214064333.429|CCO|THIS LEGISLATION HELPS ENSURE WE
20101214064333.429|20101214064334.857|CCO|FULFILL OUR RESPONSIBILITIES AS
20101214064334.857|20101214064336.286|CCO|WELL.
20101214064336.286|20101214064337.714|CCO|SHORTLY AFTER SIGNING THE FIRST
20101214064337.714|20101214064339.143|CCO|LAW ESTABLISHING SCHOOL LUNCHES,
20101214064339.143|20101214064340.571|CCO|HARRY TRUMAN SAID THAT NOTHING
20101214064340.571|20101214064342.000|CCO|IS MORE IMPORTANT IN OUR
20101214064342.000|20101214064343.429|CCO|NATIONAL LIFE THAN THE WELFARE
20101214064343.429|20101214064344.857|CCO|OF OUR CHILDREN, AND PROPER
20101214064344.857|20101214064346.286|CCO|NOURISHMENT COMES FIRST IN
20101214064346.286|20101214064347.714|CCO|ATTAINING THIS WELFARE.
20101214064347.714|20101214064349.143|CCO|TODAY I AM VERY PROUD TO SIGN
20101214064349.143|20101214064350.571|CCO|THIS BILL THAT CONTINUES THAT
20101214064350.571|20101214064352.000|CCO|LEGACY.
20101214064352.000|20101214064354.000|CCO|NOT ONLY AM I VERY PROUD OF THE
20101214064354.000|20101214064356.000|CCO|BILL, BUT HAD I NOT BEEN ABLE TO
20101214064356.000|20101214064358.000|CCO|GET THIS PASSED, I WOULD BE
20101214064358.000|20101214064400.000|CCO|SLEEPING ON THE COUCH.
20101214064400.000|20101214064402.000|CCO|[LAUGHTER]
20101214064402.000|20101214064407.000|CCO|SO NOW --
20101214064407.000|20101214064412.000|CCO|[APPLAUSE]
20101214064412.000|20101214064414.500|CCO|NOW I AM VERY PROUD TO INTRODUCE
20101214064414.500|20101214064417.000|CCO|SOMEONE WHO HAS DONE SO MUCH TO
20101214064417.000|20101214064419.500|CCO|SHINE A LIGHT ON THESE CRITICAL
20101214064419.500|20101214064422.000|CCO|ISSUES RELATED TO CHILDHOOD
20101214064422.000|20101214064424.000|CCO|NUTRITION THE END -- CHILDHOOD
20101214064424.000|20101214064426.000|CCO|NUTRITION AND OBESITY AND
20101214064426.000|20101214064428.000|CCO|EXERCISE -- AMERICA'S FIRST
20101214064428.000|20101214064430.000|CCO|LADY, MY FIRST LADY, MICHELLE
20101214064430.000|20101214064432.000|CCO|OBAMA.
20101214064432.000|20101214064435.333|CCO|[APPLAUSE]
20101214064435.333|20101214064438.667|CCO|>> THANK YOU.
20101214064438.667|20101214064442.000|CCO|THANK YOU, EVERYBODY.
20101214064442.000|20101214064447.000|CCO|THANK YOU ALL, THANKS SO MUCH,

20101214064454.000|20101214064456.000|CCO|>> AND THANK YOU, MR. PRESIDENT

20101214064500.000|20101214064502.000|CCO|HUSBAND WORKED VERY HARD TO MAKE

20101214064508.000|20101214064510.000|CCO|>> BECAUSE I WOULD BEEN SLEEPING

20101214064512.000|20101214064514.500|CCO|>> BUT I AM THRILLED TO BE HERE.
20101214064514.500|20101214064517.000|CCO|WE WILL NOT GO INTO THAT.
20101214064517.000|20101214064519.500|CCO|[LAUGHTER]
20101214064519.500|20101214064522.000|CCO|LET'S JUST SAY IT GOT DONE, SO
20101214064522.000|20101214064523.667|CCO|WE DO NOT HAVE TO GO DOWN THE
20101214064523.667|20101214064525.333|CCO|ROAD.
20101214064525.333|20101214064527.000|CCO|[LAUGHTER]
20101214064527.000|20101214064528.667|CCO|BUT I AM THRILLED TO BE HERE
20101214064528.667|20101214064530.333|CCO|WITH ALL OF YOU TODAY AS MY
20101214064530.333|20101214064532.000|CCO|HUSBAND SIGNS THE HEALTHY,
20101214064532.000|20101214064534.000|CCO|HUNGER-FREE KIDS ACT INTO LAW.
20101214064534.000|20101214064536.000|CCO|WE USUALLY HOLD THESE BILL
20101214064536.000|20101214064538.000|CCO|SIGNINGS IN THE WHITE HOUSE.
20101214064538.000|20101214064540.000|CCO|WE FELT IT WAS IMPORTANT DID
20101214064540.000|20101214064542.000|CCO|THIS ONE RIGHT HERE AT TUBMAN
20101214064542.000|20101214064543.667|CCO|ELEMENTARY BECAUSE WE WANTED TO
20101214064543.667|20101214064545.333|CCO|SHARE THIS MOMENT WITH OUR
20101214064545.333|20101214064547.000|CCO|PARTNERS -- WITH THE STUDENTS,
20101214064547.000|20101214064548.667|CCO|THE PARENTS, THE TEACHERS, THE
20101214064548.667|20101214064550.333|CCO|COMMUNITY LEADERS, LIKE ALL OF
20101214064550.333|20101214064552.000|CCO|YOU HERE WHO HAVE BEEN SO
20101214064552.000|20101214064554.000|CCO|INSTRUMENTAL.
20101214064554.000|20101214064556.000|CCO|OUR WHITE HOUSE CHEFS HAVE
20101214064556.000|20101214064558.000|CCO|WORKED CLOSELY WITH EDUCATORS AT
20101214064558.000|20101214064600.000|CCO|THIS SCHOOL AND THEY HAVE SEEN
20101214064600.000|20101214064602.000|CCO|YOUR COMMITMENT TO SERVING HIGH-
20101214064602.000|20101214064604.000|CCO|QUALITY SCHOOL MEALS TO ALL OF
20101214064604.000|20101214064606.000|CCO|YOUR STUDENTS.
20101214064606.000|20101214064608.000|CCO|I HAVE WORKED SIDE BY SIDE WITH
20101214064608.000|20101214064610.000|CCO|KIDS FROM THIS SCHOOL, AS WELL
20101214064610.000|20101214064612.000|CCO|AS FROM BANCROFT ELEMENTARY
20101214064612.000|20101214064614.000|CCO|SCHOOL, TO HARVEST OUR WHITE
20101214064614.000|20101214064616.000|CCO|HOUSE GARDEN WE COULD NOT HAVE
20101214064616.000|20101214064618.000|CCO|DONE IT WITHOUT ALL OUR STUDENTS
20101214064618.000|20101214064620.000|CCO|HELPING US.
20101214064620.000|20101214064622.000|CCO|AND I SAW HOW HARD THEY WORKED.
20101214064622.000|20101214064623.667|CCO|I ALSO SAW HOW BRAVE THEY WERE
20101214064623.667|20101214064625.333|CCO|TO TRY VEGETABLES THAT MANY OF
20101214064625.333|20101214064627.000|CCO|HAD NEVER EVEN HEARD OF.
20101214064627.000|20101214064628.667|CCO|AND I ALSO UNDERSTAND THAT THERE
20101214064628.667|20101214064630.333|CCO|ARE STUDENTS FROM MURCH
20101214064630.333|20101214064632.000|CCO|ELEMENTARY SCHOOL WHO ARE HERE
20101214064632.000|20101214064633.667|CCO|TODAY AS WELL.
20101214064633.667|20101214064635.333|CCO|WE ALL HAD JUST A GREAT TIME
20101214064635.333|20101214064637.000|CCO|LAST BRING WORKING UP A SWEAT
20101214064637.000|20101214064638.667|CCO|AND EXERCISING AND PLAYING ON
20101214064638.667|20101214064640.333|CCO|THE SOUTH LAWN OF THE WHITE
20101214064640.333|20101214064642.000|CCO|HOUSE.
20101214064642.000|20101214064644.500|CCO|WITH EVERYTHING YOU ARE DOING TO
20101214064644.500|20101214064647.000|CCO|GIVE THESE CHILDREN A HEALTHY
20101214064647.000|20101214064649.500|CCO|START IN LIFE, YOU ARE
20101214064649.500|20101214064652.000|CCO|FULFILLING THE MISSION OF THIS

20101214064654.500|20101214064657.000|CCO|THAT IS WHY WE ARE HERE.
20101214064657.000|20101214064659.500|CCO|I WANT TO THANK YOU ALL, ALL OF
20101214064659.500|20101214064702.000|CCO|OUR PARTNERS, FOR WHAT YOU HAVE
20101214064702.000|20101214064703.667|CCO|DONE, NOT JUST IN HOSTING US
20101214064703.667|20101214064705.333|CCO|HERE TODAY, BUT IN MAKING SURE
20101214064705.333|20101214064707.000|CCO|THAT WE ARE DOING THE RIGHT
20101214064707.000|20101214064708.667|CCO|THING BY OUR KIDS.
20101214064708.667|20101214064710.333|CCO|I ALSO WANT TO ECHO MY HUSBAND'S
20101214064710.333|20101214064712.000|CCO|THANKS TO LEADERS AND MEMBERS OF
20101214064712.000|20101214064714.500|CCO|CONGRESS, MANY OF WHOM ARE ON
20101214064714.500|20101214064717.000|CCO|THE STAGE, MANY OF WHOM ARE NOT
20101214064717.000|20101214064719.500|CCO|AND ARE DOWN HERE, AND YOU HAVE
20101214064719.500|20101214064722.000|CCO|ALL DONE JUST A TREMENDOUS THING
20101214064722.000|20101214064724.500|CCO|IN MAKING THIS DAY POSSIBLE.
20101214064724.500|20101214064727.000|CCO|AS THE SAID -- AS HE SAID, THIS
20101214064727.000|20101214064729.500|CCO|WAS TRULY A BIPARTISAN EFFORT,
20101214064729.500|20101214064732.000|CCO|WITH PASSIONATE SUPPORTERS FROM
20101214064732.000|20101214064734.000|CCO|BOTH PARTIES PUTTING IN LATE
20101214064734.000|20101214064736.000|CCO|NIGHTS AND LONG WEEKENDS,
20101214064736.000|20101214064738.000|CCO|WORKING AROUND THE CLOCK TO MAKE
20101214064738.000|20101214064740.000|CCO|SURE THAT THIS BILL THAT PASSED.
20101214064740.000|20101214064742.000|CCO|WHILE WE MAY SOMETIMES HAVE OUR
20101214064742.000|20101214064743.667|CCO|DIFFERENCES, WE CAN ALL AGREE
20101214064743.667|20101214064745.333|CCO|THAT IN THE UNITED STATES OF
20101214064745.333|20101214064747.000|CCO|AMERICA NO CHILD SHOULD GO TO
20101214064747.000|20101214064748.667|CCO|SCHOOL HUNGRY.
20101214064748.667|20101214064750.333|CCO|WE CAN ALL AGREE -- 
20101214064750.333|20101214064752.000|CCO|[APPLAUSE]
20101214064752.000|20101214064802.000|CCO|WE CAN ALL AGREE THAT IN THE
20101214064802.000|20101214064804.000|CCO|WEALTHIEST NATION ON EARTH, ALL
20101214064804.000|20101214064806.000|CCO|CHILDREN SHOULD HAVE THE BASIC
20101214064806.000|20101214064808.000|CCO|NUTRITION THEY NEED TO LEARN AND
20101214064808.000|20101214064810.000|CCO|GROW AND TO PURSUE THEIR DREAMS,
20101214064810.000|20101214064812.000|CCO|BECAUSE IN THE END, NOTHING IS
20101214064812.000|20101214064813.667|CCO|MORE IMPORTANT THAN THE HEALTH
20101214064813.667|20101214064815.333|CCO|AND WELL-BEING OF OUR CHILDREN.
20101214064815.333|20101214064817.000|CCO|NOTHING.
20101214064817.000|20101214064818.667|CCO|AND OUR HOPES FOR THEIR FUTURE
20101214064818.667|20101214064820.333|CCO|SHOULD DRIVE EVERY SINGLE
20101214064820.333|20101214064822.000|CCO|DECISION THAT WE MAKE.
20101214064822.000|20101214064824.500|CCO|THESE ARE THE BASIC VALUES THAT
20101214064824.500|20101214064827.000|CCO|WE ALL SHARE, REGARDLESS OF
20101214064827.000|20101214064829.500|CCO|RACE, PARTY, RELIGION.
20101214064829.500|20101214064832.000|CCO|THIS IS WHAT WE SHARE.
20101214064832.000|20101214064834.000|CCO|THESE ARE THE VALUES THAT THIS
20101214064834.000|20101214064836.000|CCO|BILL EMBODIES.
20101214064836.000|20101214064838.000|CCO|AND THAT IS WHY WE OF SEEN SUCH
20101214064838.000|20101214064840.000|CCO|A GROUNDSWELL OF SUPPORT FOR
20101214064840.000|20101214064842.000|CCO|THESE EFFORTS -- NOT JUST FROM
20101214064842.000|20101214064844.000|CCO|MEMBERS OF CONGRESS HERE IN
20101214064844.000|20101214064846.000|CCO|WASHINGTON, BUT FROM FOLKS IN
20101214064846.000|20101214064848.000|CCO|EVERY CORNER OF THE COUNTRY.
20101214064848.000|20101214064850.000|CCO|IT HAS BEEN BEAUTIFUL TO SEE.
20101214064850.000|20101214064852.000|CCO|FROM EDUCATORS WORKING TO
20101214064852.000|20101214064853.667|CCO|PROVIDE HEALTHIER SCHOOL MEALS
20101214064853.667|20101214064855.333|CCO|BECAUSE THEY KNOW THE
20101214064855.333|20101214064857.000|CCO|CONNECTION BETWEEN PROPER
20101214064857.000|20101214064858.667|CCO|NUTRITION AND ACADEMIC
20101214064858.667|20101214064900.333|CCO|PERFORMANCE.
20101214064900.333|20101214064902.000|CCO|FROM DOCTORS AND NURSES WHO KNOW
20101214064902.000|20101214064905.333|CCO|THAT UNHEALTHY KIDS GROW INTO
20101214064905.333|20101214064908.667|CCO|UNHEALTHY ADULTS, AT RISK FOR
20101214064908.667|20101214064912.000|CCO|OBESITY-RELATED DISEASES LIKE
20101214064912.000|20101214064914.000|CCO|DIABETES, HEART DISEASE, CANCER.
20101214064914.000|20101214064916.000|CCO|FROM BUSINESS AND LABOR LEADERS
20101214064916.000|20101214064918.000|CCO|WHO KNOW THAT WE SPEND NEARLY
20101214064918.000|20101214064920.000|CCO|$150 BILLION A YEAR TO TREAT
20101214064920.000|20101214064922.000|CCO|THESE DISEASES AND WHO WORRY
20101214064922.000|20101214064924.250|CCO|ABOUT THE IMPACT ON OUR ECONOMY.
20101214064924.250|20101214064926.500|CCO|FROM ADVOCATES AND FAITH
20101214064926.500|20101214064928.750|CCO|LEADERS WHO KNOW THAT SCHOOL
20101214064928.750|20101214064931.000|CCO|MEALS ARE VITAL FOR COMBATING
20101214064931.000|20101214064933.500|CCO|HUNGER, FEEDING MORE THAN 31
20101214064933.500|20101214064936.000|CCO|MILLION CHILDREN A DAY.
20101214064936.000|20101214064938.500|CCO|AND FROM MILITARY LEADERS WHO
20101214064938.500|20101214064941.000|CCO|TELL US THAT WHEN MORE THAN ONE
20101214064941.000|20101214064943.000|CCO|IN FOUR YOUNG PEOPLE ARE
20101214064943.000|20101214064945.000|CCO|UNQUALIFIED FOR MILITARY
20101214064945.000|20101214064947.000|CCO|SERVICE BECAUSE OF THEIR WEIGHT,
20101214064947.000|20101214064949.000|CCO|THEY TELL US THAT CHILDHOOD
20101214064949.000|20101214064951.000|CCO|OBESITY IS NOT JUST A PUBLIC
20101214064951.000|20101214064953.500|CCO|HEALTH ISSUE, THEY TELL US THAT
20101214064953.500|20101214064956.000|CCO|IT IS NOT JUST AN ECONOMIC
20101214064956.000|20101214064958.500|CCO|THREAT, IT IS A NATIONAL
20101214064958.500|20101214065001.000|CCO|SECURITY THREAT AS WELL.
20101214065001.000|20101214065002.667|CCO|THESE FOLKS COME AT THIS ISSUE
20101214065002.667|20101214065004.333|CCO|FROM ALL DIFFERENT ANGLES.
20101214065004.333|20101214065006.000|CCO|BUT THEY HAVE COME TOGETHER TO
20101214065006.000|20101214065007.667|CCO|SUPPORT THIS BILL BECAUSE THEY
20101214065007.667|20101214065009.333|CCO|KNOW IT IS THE RIGHT THING TO DO
20101214065009.333|20101214065011.000|CCO|FOR OUR KIDS.
20101214065011.000|20101214065013.500|CCO|THEY KNOW THAT THE LONG RUN, IT
20101214065013.500|20101214065016.000|CCO|WILL NOT JUST SAVE MONEY, BUT IT
20101214065016.000|20101214065018.500|CCO|WILL SAVE US LIVES.
20101214065018.500|20101214065021.000|CCO|LET'S BE CLEAR -- THESE FOLKS DO
20101214065021.000|20101214065023.000|CCO|NOT TO SUPPORT THIS BILL AS
20101214065023.000|20101214065025.000|CCO|LEADERS AND AS PROFESSIONALS,
20101214065025.000|20101214065027.000|CCO|BUT AS PARENTS AS WELL.
20101214065027.000|20101214065029.000|CCO|AND WE KNOW THAT ENSURING KIDS
20101214065029.000|20101214065031.000|CCO|THAT KIDS EAT RIGHT AND STAY
20101214065031.000|20101214065032.667|CCO|ACTIVE IS ULTIMATELY THE
20101214065032.667|20101214065034.333|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY OF PARENTS MORE
20101214065034.333|20101214065036.000|CCO|THAN ANYONE ELSE.
20101214065036.000|20101214065037.667|CCO|AND EVERYWHERE I GO,
20101214065037.667|20101214065039.333|CCO|FORTUNATELY, I MEET PARENTS WHO
20101214065039.333|20101214065041.000|CCO|ARE WORKING VERY HARD TO MAKE
20101214065041.000|20101214065042.429|CCO|SURE THAT THEIR KIDS ARE
20101214065042.429|20101214065043.857|CCO|HEALTHY.
20101214065043.857|20101214065045.286|CCO|THEY ARE DOING THINGS LIKE
20101214065045.286|20101214065046.714|CCO|CUTTING DOWN ON DESSERTS AND
20101214065046.714|20101214065048.143|CCO|TRYING TO INCREASE FRUITS AND
20101214065048.143|20101214065049.571|CCO|VEGETABLES.
20101214065049.571|20101214065051.000|CCO|THEY ARE TRYING TO TEACH THEIR
20101214065051.000|20101214065053.000|CCO|KIDS THE KIND OF HEALTHY HABITS
20101214065053.000|20101214065055.000|CCO|THAT WILL STAY WITH THEM FOR A
20101214065055.000|20101214065057.000|CCO|LIFETIME.
20101214065057.000|20101214065059.000|CCO|BUT WHEN OUR KIDS SPEND SO MUCH
20101214065059.000|20101214065101.000|CCO|OF THEIR TIME EACH DAY IN
20101214065101.000|20101214065103.500|CCO|SCHOOL, AND WHEN MANY KIDS GET
20101214065103.500|20101214065106.000|CCO|UP TO HALF THEIR DAILY CALORIES
20101214065106.000|20101214065108.500|CCO|FROM SCHOOL MEALS, IT IS CLEAR
20101214065108.500|20101214065111.000|CCO|THAT WE AS A NATION HAVE A
20101214065111.000|20101214065112.667|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY TO MEET AS WELL.
20101214065112.667|20101214065114.333|CCO|WE CANNOT JUST LEAVE IT UP TO
20101214065114.333|20101214065116.000|CCO|THE PARENTS.
20101214065116.000|20101214065117.667|CCO|I THINK THAT PARENTS HAVE A
20101214065117.667|20101214065119.333|CCO|RIGHT TO EXPECT THAT THEIR
20101214065119.333|20101214065121.000|CCO|EFFORTS AT HOME WILL NOT BE
20101214065121.000|20101214065123.000|CCO|UNDONE EACH DAY IN THE SCHOOL
20101214065123.000|20101214065125.000|CCO|CAFETERIA OR AND THE VENDING
20101214065125.000|20101214065127.000|CCO|MACHINE IN THE HALLWAY.
20101214065127.000|20101214065129.000|CCO|I THINK THAT OUR PARENTS HAVE A
20101214065129.000|20101214065131.000|CCO|RIGHT TO EXPECT THAT THEIR KIDS
20101214065131.000|20101214065133.000|CCO|WILL BE SERVED FRESH, HEALTHY
20101214065133.000|20101214065135.000|CCO|FOOD THAT MEETS HIGH NUTRITIONAL
20101214065135.000|20101214065137.000|CCO|STANDARDS.
20101214065137.000|20101214065139.000|CCO|AND PARTICULARLY IN THESE TOUGH
20101214065139.000|20101214065141.000|CCO|ECONOMIC TIMES, WHEN SO MANY
20101214065141.000|20101214065143.000|CCO|FAMILIES ARE STRUGGLING, WHEN
20101214065143.000|20101214065145.000|CCO|SCHOOL MEALS SOMETIMES ARE THE
20101214065145.000|20101214065147.000|CCO|MAIN SOURCE OF NOURISHMENT FOR
20101214065147.000|20101214065149.000|CCO|SO MANY KIDS, WE HAVE AN
20101214065149.000|20101214065151.000|CCO|OBLIGATION TO MAKE SURE THAT
20101214065151.000|20101214065153.000|CCO|THOSE MEALS ARE AS NUTRITIOUS AS
20101214065153.000|20101214065155.000|CCO|POSSIBLE.
20101214065155.000|20101214065157.000|CCO|BUT BY IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF
20101214065157.000|20101214065159.000|CCO|THE SCHOOL MEALS AND MAKING SURE
20101214065159.000|20101214065201.000|CCO|THAT MORE CHILDREN HAVE ACCESS
20101214065201.000|20101214065206.000|CCO|TO THEM, THAT IS PRECISELY WHAT
20101214065206.000|20101214065211.000|CCO|THE HEALTHY, HUNGER-FREE KIT ACT
20101214065211.000|20101214065212.667|CCO|IS GOING TO DO.
20101214065212.667|20101214065214.333|CCO|WHILE IT MIGHT SEEM
20101214065214.333|20101214065216.000|CCO|COUNTERINTUITIVE, HUNGER AND
20101214065216.000|20101214065217.667|CCO|OBESITY ARE JUST TWO SIDES OF
20101214065217.667|20101214065219.333|CCO|THE SAME COIN.
20101214065219.333|20101214065221.000|CCO|BOTH ROB OUR CHILDREN OF THE
20101214065221.000|20101214065223.000|CCO|ENERGY, THE STRENGTH, AND THE
20101214065223.000|20101214065225.000|CCO|STAMINA THAT THEY NEED TO
20101214065225.000|20101214065227.000|CCO|SUCCEED IN SCHOOL AND IN LIFE.
20101214065227.000|20101214065229.000|CCO|THAT ROBS OUR COUNTRY OF SO MUCH
20101214065229.000|20101214065231.000|CCO|OF THEIR PROMISE.
20101214065231.000|20101214065232.667|CCO|BOTH CAN BE SOLVED WHEN WE COME
20101214065232.667|20101214065234.333|CCO|TOGETHER TO PROVIDE OUR CHILDREN
20101214065234.333|20101214065236.000|CCO|WITH THE NUTRITIOUS FOOD THAT
20101214065236.000|20101214065237.667|CCO|THEY NEED AND DESERVE.
20101214065237.667|20101214065239.333|CCO|THAT IS WHY FOR WELL OVER HALF A
20101214065239.333|20101214065241.000|CCO|CENTURY, WE HAVE MADE CHILD
20101214065241.000|20101214065243.500|CCO|NUTRITION A NATIONAL PRIORITY.

20101214065303.000|20101214065305.000|CCO|1966.
20101214065305.000|20101214065307.000|CCO|THE IDEA FOR THAT ACT CAME FROM
20101214065307.000|20101214065309.000|CCO|A PRIEST NAMED REVEREND @ C.B.
20101214065309.000|20101214065311.000|CCO|WOODRICH, WHO WORKED WITH
20101214065311.000|20101214065313.000|CCO|CHILDREN IN DENVER, COLORADO.
20101214065313.000|20101214065315.000|CCO|MANY OF THESE KIDS WERE ALL
20101214065315.000|20101214065317.000|CCO|GOING HUNGRY BECAUSE THEY COULD

20101214065321.000|20101214065323.000|CCO|WAS UNCONSCIONAAND DECIDED

20101214065345.000|20101214065347.000|CCO|THE SIZE OF THE PHOTO ALBUM WAS

20101214065351.000|20101214065353.000|CCO|ENOUGH TO COVER EVERYTHING ELSE
